QuestData.Title: Slumber No More
QuestData.Description:
There's something you should look into. You've got the time anyway, those goblins aren't ready yet.
There's a statue nearby. Only, it's not a statue to the trained tortollan eye. It's a deactivated titan keeper!
Noises have been coming from that thing ever since you helped Krag'wa. It must be trying to reactivate itself.
I bet that titan-looking amulet of yours could help restart it. We'd be unstoppable against the blood trolls with a titan keeper's help.
Go see if you can restart this titan!
QuestData.LogDescription: Examine the deactivated titan keeper outside of Gloom Hollow.
